overview: From 2025-10-26 to 2025-10-27, Sendo-labs/leaderboard-rewards had 0 new PRs (1 merged), 0 new issues, and 2 active contributors.

topPRs.title: Reward contributors
topPRs.author: chainsona
topPRs.body:
## Problem
OSS contributors deserve fair, transparent rewards for their work. Manual reward distribution doesn't scale and lacks verifiability.

## Solution
Built an oracle bot that fetches contributor XP from leaderboard API and syncs to Solana program for contributors to claim from.

completedItems.title: Reward contributors
completedItems.body:

topContributors.summary: standujar: Primarily focused on significant development within the Sendo-labs ecosystem, notably migrating to the `plugin-sendo-analyser` implementation via PR #1 (+17774 lines) and enhancing pagination for trades in PR #3, alongside general other work and bug fixes across 245 files.

Neysixx: Focused on feature development, successfully merging a substantial PR in Sendo-labs/frontend (#10) that introduced a new feature with over 1000 lines of code, demonstrating a primary focus on feature work and code contributions.
plvo: Focused on documentation work, opening one PR in Sendo-labs/Reports (#2) that modified 3 files with a net addition of 240 lines, indicating a primary focus on docs.
Fleo-Thyphon-ElizaOS: Today's activity focused on tests work, with a single commit modifying 12 files (+1527/-617 lines) and one PR comment, indicating a concentrated effort on testing.
